# Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
library(COVID19)
```

# Examining situation in USA
```{r}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level = 2)
ggplot(covid_us, aes(x = date , y = confirmed)) + geom_line() +
facet_wrap(~id)
```

# Examining situation in USA
```{r}
covid_us %>% dplyr::filter(id %in%
c("USA, New York",
                             "USA, Arizona",
                             "USA, Utah",
                             "USA, Florida")
) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = date , y = confirmed, color = id)) + geom_line()
```
